solution_line_template: Lowry earns ${small_bonsai_cost} x {num_small_bonsai} = $<<{small_bonsai_cost}*{num_small_bonsai}={earnings_small_bonsai}>>{earnings_small_bonsai} from selling {num_small_bonsai} small bonsai.
He earned ${big_bonsai_cost} x {num_big_bonsai} = $<<{big_bonsai_cost}*{num_big_bonsai}={earnings_big_bonsai}>>{earnings_big_bonsai} from selling {num_big_bonsai} big bonsai.
Therefore, the total amount he earned is ${earnings_big_bonsai} + ${earnings_small_bonsai} = $<<{earnings_big_bonsai}+{earnings_small_bonsai}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
